entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and son of Lily and James. He is described as 'his living son' in the text.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's who has taken his hand to comfort him.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is Harry's mother who died. Her remains are described as 'moldering' and 'unknowing'.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is Harry's father who died. His remains are also described as 'moldering' and 'unknowing'.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is a location where the graves of Lily and James are located.

relationships.description: Harry is the child of Lily, who died. Harry's heart still beats because of his mother's sacrifice.
Harry is also the child of James, who died. Harry's heart still beats because of his father's sacrifice.
Hermione is a friend of Harry's who has taken his hand to comfort him.
